name: Mitch Russo
offering: Business Coaching, Coach Certification, Coach Promotion, Course Creation Software
what_you_do: Mitch Russo is a business coach, author, and podcast host who helps CEOs and entrepreneurs grow their businesses through certification programs and strategic coaching.
who_you_serve: Business owners and CEOs who want to scale their companies and create recurring revenue.
social_proof: Founded Timeslips Corp and sold it for eight figures; served as COO of Sage PLC; worked with Tony Robbins and Chet Holmes to build a $25M business; author with 25+ years of business experience.
signature_programs: The Invisible Organization (book); custom Certification Programs
business_focus: Helping CEOs and entrepreneurs scale their businesses and create recurring revenue through custom certification programs.
service_provided: business coaching, certification program creation, CEO strategy, company scaling
